comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: That's Madeleine Edison (check spelling) (1888-1979), daughter of Thomas Edison. This might have been an engagement portrait; she was married in 1914, to aviator John Eyre Sloane. Her four sons were Thomas Edison's only grandchildren. www.nps.gov/edis/historyculture/madeleine-edison-sloane.htm

comment.author: 49503122659@N01
comment._content: thanks much for posting - it's a wonderful portrait and and looks to be in excellent condition -
